answers.answer: There are quite a few eye and "body" problems that might cause this. You need to work through ruling out the causes with an Eye MD ophthalmologist.. This could be a sign of something serious so don't ignore.JCH MD

question: Hi I left a message earler about an eye issue regarding a cloudy film in my left eye. It is occasional and usually at night, but not always and it usually lasts for a minute to five minutes. It's a cloudy film that affects my vision and I cant see out of my eye very well during the few minutes it last. Is this any concern? Diabetes have already been ruled out.
title: to add more detail to an earlier question
